name: Java
description: Proceed with caution. Consider modern alternatives for new projects.

name: GraphQL
description: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data. GraphQL provides a complete and understandable description of the data in your API, gives clients the power to ask for exactly what they need and nothing more, makes it easier to evolve APIs over time, and enables powerful developer tools.

name: Kotlin
description: Proven and recommended for Android and JVM development. Modern, concise, and fully interoperable with Java.

name: React
description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is proven and recommended for building user interfaces.

name: Spring Boot
description: Spring Boot is a framework for building web applications. It is proven and recommended for building web applications.

name: Next.js
description: Next.js is a React framework for building server-side rendered and static websites. It is proven and recommended for building websites.

name: KMP
description: Kotlin Multiplatform is a Kotlin feature that allows you to share code between different platforms. It is proven and recommended for cross-platform development.

name: Retrofit
description: Retrofit is a type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java. It is proven and recommended for building HTTP clients.

name: Go (Golang)
description: Fast, statically typed language designed for simplicity and efficiency. Worth exploring for microservices and cloud-native applications.

name: Terraform
description: Infrastructure as Code tool. Industry standard for multi-cloud infrastructure management. Proven and recommended.

name: GitOps
description: Git-based operational practices for infrastructure and application deployment. Proven approach for declarative infrastructure and continuous delivery.

name: Trivy
description: Comprehensive security scanner for containers and other artifacts. Worth exploring for vulnerability detection in CI/CD pipelines.

name: Postgres
description: Relational database management system. Proven and recommended for data storage and retrieval.

name: CNPG
description: Cloud Native PostgreSQL. Proven and recommended for data storage and retrieval.

name: Document DB
description: Document database management system. Proven and recommended for data storage and retrieval.

name: Mysql
description: Mysql is a relational database management system. Proven and recommended for data storage and retrieval.

name: Avro Schema
description: Avro Schema is a schema for Avro data. It is proven and recommended for data storage and retrieval.

name: Kafka
description: Kafka is a distributed streaming platform. Proven and recommended for data streaming and processing.

name: Grpc
description: Grpc is a high-performance, open-source RPC framework that enables efficient communication between services. Proven and recommended for microservices and cloud-native applications.

name: Grafana
description: Grafana is an open-source analytics and monitoring platform that enables users to visualize and analyze metrics from various data sources. Proven and recommended for monitoring and analytics.

name: Extreme Programming
description: Extreme Programming is a software development methodology that emphasizes continuous delivery, rapid feedback, and customer collaboration. Proven and recommended for software development.

name: Semantic Release
description: Semantic Release is a tool that automates the release process. Proven and recommended for software development.

name: EKS
description: EKS is a managed Kubernetes service that is proven and recommended for cloud-native applications.

name: Aws Lambda
description: Aws Lambda is a serverless compute service that enables you to run code without provisioning or managing servers. Proven and recommended for cloud-native applications.

name: Teleport
description: Teleport is a tool that enables you to manage your infrastructure and applications. Proven and recommended for infrastructure and application management.

name: Pengolin
description: Pengolin is a tool that enables you to manage your infrastructure and applications. Proven and recommended for infrastructure and application management.

name: GrowthBook
description: GrowthBook is a tool that enables you to manage your infrastructure and applications. Proven and recommended for infrastructure and application management.

name: WebSocket
description: The WebSocket API makes it possible to open a two-way interactive communication session between the user's browser and a server.

name: Python
description: Versatile language for data science, ML, automation, and web development. Proven and recommended for wide range of applications.
